message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product, and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $110 to start.  What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your suggestion. I'd like to propose a price of $95 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value, but I'm looking for something closer to $105. This product has a lot of unique benefits that I think you'll really appreciate.
I see your point, Alice. Let me make a counteroffer of $100 for the product.
